# ===========================================
# AI CRM Development Challenge - Environment Variables
# ===========================================
# Copy this content to .env.local and fill in your actual values

# ===========================================
# Convex Database Configuration
# ===========================================
# These are automatically generated when you run `npx convex dev`
CONVEX_DEPLOYMENT=dev:determined-loris-339
NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL=https://determined-loris-339.convex.cloud

# ===========================================
# OpenAI Configuration (Required for AI features)
# ===========================================
# Get your API key from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key_here

# ===========================================
# QStash Configuration (Required for automation)
# ===========================================
# Get your token from: https://console.upstash.com/qstash
QSTASH_TOKEN=your_qstash_token_here

# ===========================================
# Next.js Configuration
# ===========================================
# For Vercel deployment (automatically set by Vercel)
# VERCEL_URL=your-app.vercel.app


# ===========================================
# Optional: Analytics
# ===========================================
# Vercel Analytics (automatically enabled on Vercel)
# VERCEL_ANALYTICS_ID=your_analytics_id
